content.15: The prediction mask for the PERSON class is quite accurate, capturing the overall shape of the individuals. However, the boundaries are not well-defined, especially around the hands and the lower parts of the bodies. The prediction mask is also slightly over-extended towards the table.

content.7: The prediction mask of the CAR region is quite accurate overall, but the boundary is not well-defined, especially around the wheel area. The prediction extends slightly beyond the ground truth CAR region.
content.15: The prediction mask of the PERSON region is quite chaotic, with many false positives appearing on the left side of the scene, especially around the car. The ground truth PERSON region is not fully captured by the prediction, with some parts missing on the right side. The boundaries of the PERSON region are also quite imprecise.

content.12: The prediction mask of the DOG class is quite rough, especially around the head and ears. The boundaries are not well-defined, and some parts of the DOG are missing in the prediction. The tail region is also not accurately segmented.
content.17: The prediction mask of the SHEEP region is quite fragmented, missing large portions of the ground truth. The boundary of the SHEEP is not well-defined, with significant gaps and over-extensions into the unlabelled regions.
